duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist surgeons during medical procedures by preparing the operating room, arranging equipment, and handling surgical instruments.
Maintain sterile techniques and ensure all surgical equipment is properly cleaned and sterilized.
Provide patient care by monitoring vital signs, preparing patients for surgery, and assisting with post-operative care.
Contribute to the efficient functioning of the operating room by organizing and managing surgical instruments and supplies.
Utilize knowledge of anatomy and medical terminology to support surgeons and other medical staff during procedures.
Collaborate with the healthcare team, demonstrating strong teamwork and critical thinking skills in a fast-paced environment.

education_certification.credential: Completion of an accredited surgical technologist program
